backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend for the ICP application.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the replacement of 'mukesh@example.com' with 'mukeshhkumarr16@gmail.com' in the Contact component with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend component files describing their functionality, styling, and design system implementation with figma/coral/tangerine color palette.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes, including sidebar, chart, and UI component color definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, Google Fonts preconnect, and viewport configuration for Mukesh Kumar M's portfolio.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component that forces dark mode and renders all portfolio sections with AnimatedBackground, ScrollProgress, Navbar, and ScrollToTop components.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component with intersection observer animation, profile image with gradient glow, bio text, and four key points cards featuring icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedBackgrou: Canvas-based animated background rendering a grid pattern and rotating artboard elements with gradient fills using figma purple, coral pink, and tangerine orange colors.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section with glassmorphism cards displaying contact info (email: mukeshhkumarr16@gmail.com, location, availability) and a contact form with name, email, and message fields.
frontend/src/components/Experience.tsx: Displays work experience section with animated timeline, company cards showing roles, achievements, and scroll-based progress indicators using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders footer with copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with dynamic year and hostname-based UTM parameters.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with animated gradient text, parallax floating UI elements, particle background, and CTA buttons that scroll to About and Contact sections.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with scroll-based styling, active section tracking, smooth scrolling to sections, and responsive mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Renders an animated grid background overlay with scrolling animation using a design-grid image.
frontend/src/components/Projects.tsx: Projects showcase with 3D tilt effect cards, spotlight hover interactions, gradient backgrounds, and animated badges for project tags.
frontend/src/components/ScrollProgress.t: Fixed top progress bar that fills horizontally based on page scroll position using gradient colors.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTop.tsx: Floating button that appears after scrolling 300px down and smoothly scrolls back to page top when clicked.
frontend/src/components/Skills.tsx: Skills section displaying categorized expertise in a bento grid layout with animated cards, icons, and staggered fade-in effects.
frontend/src/hooks/use3DTilt.ts: Empty file, likely intended for a custom hook to handle 3D tilt effects (currently unused).
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages ICP actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatically creating anonymous or authenticated actors based on identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFramerAnimations.t: Empty file placeholder for Framer Motion animation hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMouseParallax.ts: Empty file placeholder for mouse parallax effect hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file with comment indicating no backend query methods exist; all content is static and client-side rendered.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollProgress.ts: Empty file placeholder for scroll progress tracking hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpotlight.ts: Empty file placeholder for spotlight effect hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind imports, custom OKLCH color palette for light/dark modes featuring enhanced figma purple, coral, and tangerine colors with improved chroma and contrast ratios, and Plus Jakarta Sans font configuration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient provider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with OKLCH-based color system including figma purple, coral, and tangerine palettes, custom animations, typography plugin, and container queries support.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a modern portfolio website for Mukesh Kumar M with Mobbin-style UI/UX, featuring hero section, timeline experience, project showcases, bento-grid skills, and contact form built with React, Vite, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, and Framer Motion.
